titleStmt.title: A golden trumpet, to rowse vp a drowsie magistrate: or, A patterne for a governors practise drawne from Christs comming to, beholding of, and weeping ouer Hierusalem. As it was founded at Pauls Crosse the 1. of Aprill, 1624. By Iohn Lawrence preacher of the word of God in the citie of London.
titleStmt.author: Lawrence, John, preacher of the word of God in London.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
